amendment.description: To modify the penalty for nonenforcement of open container requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2430 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2430 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 2285. (consideration: CR S1225-1229, S1232; text: S1225) To modify the penalty for nonenforcement of open container requirements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2430 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2430 proposed by Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 2285.
